p: The leaf samples of Myrcia eximia DC were dried in an air-circulation oven for five days, at 35 °C, and then crushed in a knife mill (Tecnal, model TE-631/3, Piracicaba/SP, Brazil) at a speed of 2251 rpm for 10 min. The moisture content was analyzed by using a moisture analyzer (model IV2500, GEHAKA, Duquesa de Goiás, Real Parque, São Paulo, Brazil).
